article_title: Greg Hardy suspension reduced from 10 to 4 games
article_text:
The United States' first known case of a superbug that cannot be killed by any existing antibiotic was announced Thursday by the U.S. Department of Defense.

Centers for Disease Control and Prevention Director Dr. Tom Frieden announced the case at the ...

article_metadata.author: Ricardo LeCompte

og.description: The former Carolina Panthers and current Dallas Cowboys defensive end had his suspension reduced from 10 games to 4 on Friday.
